txt.en: Follow Grímyr
Grímyr has asked that you follow him to a more discreet location.
Instance: A Secret Meeting
Defend yourself
'I do not want to hear your excuses! You must stand before the King! Now!'
Grímyr has suddenly attacked you!\n\nYou should defend yourself!
TBD
Talk to Grímyr
'This way! Come, come, it is an urgent matter I must discuss!'
'No one here? Good, good.'
'Now, then. This door. You remember this door, yes?'
'Of course you do. And you remember... what was behind this door?'
'I am sorry, [placeholder], I must do this....'
'They say you know too much! You must die!'
'The voices! The voices compel me!'
'Erk.... Forgive me, [placeholder]. I could not resist them....'
'Do not... listen... to the voices....'
A dwarf named Grímyr has asked to speak with you privately about some urgent matter.
Grímyr suddenly attacks!
'What is going on over there?!'
'Is that Grímyr? He is dead!'
'What have you done, [placeholder]? You must answer for this!'
The guards are approaching!
'Thank you, [placeholder]. What I must say is very important. Come, let us move somewhere more private.'
Grímyr is waiting to speak with you.
'Come, we must tend to the wounded and assess the damage to the camp.'
